lead_paragraph: Boeing technicians, trainers and managers will be the first United States citizens to take up residence in Iran since 1980, when all 140,000 Americans there were forced to leave.

byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

headline.print_headline: With Boeing Agreement, Americans Will Return to Iran
headline.main: With Boeing Deal, Americans Are Coming to Iran

snippet: Boeing technicians, trainers and managers will be the first United States citizens to take up residence in Iran since 1980, when all 140,000 Americans there were forced to leave....
